import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as data from '../../../../../shared/data/dashboard/ecommerce' @Component({ selector: 'app-order-board', templateUrl: './order-board.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order-board.component.scss'] }) export class OrderBoardComponent { public newOrders = data.newOrders public newCustomers = data.newCustomers public averageSale = data.averageSale public grossProfit = data.grossProfit }
